name: Blueberry Pancakes Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: greek yogurt, ripe banana, oats, egg, vanilla extract, baking powder, cinnamon, fresh blueberry
recipeInstructionSteps: In a blender, blend everything besides the blueberries.
Pour pancake batter on a griddle or skillet over medium-high heat, and place blueberries on the pancake.
Cook until bubbles pop on the surface of the pancake, then flip and cook the other side.
